entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , McBride
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 9 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
